post.body: nice seagull! ya did it gal!
if it bleeds it leads - doing intelligent life design program - agreed no news.
no, I teach at Assaf Harope every-other years,have friends from gush katif, & Hebron is one of my favorite places!!
watching it with your son is really special - you need a book "before I was your Mom" with photos and stuff!
Nothing you'll find in any nutrition book! You eating that?
Nice! Bet it was fun!!
how about dried tart cherries?
oh mercy no! But thanks!
amazing dreams!
nah, I have a brain like swiss cheese!
cherry vodka ok, probably like slo-gin fizz & 17 yo me! I won't ask
then it is time!!!! Something good your way comes!!the 1st of many!
ohforevermore! those were learning days! Gin even the smell - whooooeeee
thank you so much! You got your new glasses?
ya said you were addicted to twitter way back when--and I just figured!
thanks dude!
you are a good guy to share your iphone with a 15 mo old. Is it water resistant? they drool!
going to rummage the kitchen for a snack bbl
I hope BeTwittered works on hospital computer when I am on call Monday!
trying out BeTwittered on google/ig
